value: town_in
A moderate crowd is gathered around one of the city entrances as if there was a parade.
Hmm? What's going on here?
You don't know?
Sir Victor returns from his expedition.
set
We aren't quite locals. Who's that?
He's the strongest fighter around these lands.
Nonsense, I'm the strongest fighter around these lands.
No, you aren't.
He almost single-handedly won the conclusive battle of the trade wars 15 years ago.
And he has been defending the kingdom's peace all these years.
Well, isn't he popular.
He sure is! Despite his age, he has no contenders in the arena or in training.
Are you in his fan club or something?
... Maybe, what's it to you?
Okay, this is getting silly.
Let's go already, there's nothing to do here.
Maybe I'll start my own fanclub eventually.
I don't think that's how it works.
Oh, you gonna have a fanclub? Can I join!?
Sure, once we start our campaign for world domination we can use all the help we can get.
Eh? What's world domination?
Ignore it Ember, it's not important.
Hmph. Don't make me reconsider your second-in-command position, Rose.
